Method Detail

setContent

public final void setContent(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget w)

setContentDiv

public final void setContentDiv(java.lang.String html)
Set the contents of the balloon. When the balloon is shown, the HTML Div Element is attached to the balloon element in the web page. You can manipulate this balloon using ordinary HTML DOM techniques.

Parameters:
html - The HTML to be inserted into a DIV

getContentDiv

public final com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject getContentDiv()
The google API returns an 'ISupports' but this class has no documentation so returning a JavaScriptObject for now. Maybe we can return com.google.gwt.dom.client.DivElement?

Returns:
An HTMLDivElement to be used as the contents of the balloon. When the balloon is shown, the HTMLDivElement is attached to the balloon element in the web page. You can manipulate this balloon using ordinary HTML DOM techniques.
